Please refer to APS HQ letter no. (7865) dated 14.09.2023 on the above cited subject.
2. 
Vide letter under reference, it was requested to share small write up with supporting
photog raphs/videos of exceptional good work/noteworthy achievements to FHQrs.
3. 
Now FHQ vide letter no. (637) dated 05.10.2023 (copy enclosed) has informed that in
compliance, ASGS and other units are sharing the aforesaid contents featuring celebrities,
applauding the commendable efforts of the CISF at airports and other units. However, in
addition to that of celebrities, short clips of general public, particularly children, elderly
passengers and differently abled individuals, expressing their gratitude for the assistance and
commendable work performed by the CISF may also be posted on social media platforms.
4. 
ln view of the above, I have been directed to request all CASOs to comply with the
aforesaid directions and share the relevant contents directly to FHO (PR Cell) at e-mail ld
dcpro@cisf.qov.in.
5. 
This has been issued with the approval of the Competent Authority.
Encl. as above.
